reviews.author: Heather D
reviews.review: Terrible. One of my friends lost everything when her rental burned down due to an electrical fire that started in the wall and Lakeway tried to sue them. Another friend rented a house from them that had mushrooms growing out of the wall

reviews.author: Noel Schumacher
reviews.review: was just reminiscing, havent lived in a lakeway property for three years. when we moved in, there was rat poop everywhere- i mean everywhere. they said they would send someone, no one ever came. these people are slum lords, whiny, and completely checked out. i hate you guys, from the bottom of my heart.

reviews.author: Jose Caceres-Bjorklund
reviews.review: It's too bad you can't give zero stars. Absolutely horrible company that has a huge choke hold on a lot of properties in bellingham. They do not care about tenants and will leave you without a working dryer for months. Without heat in the

reviews.author: Michael Dykstra
reviews.review: NEVER RENT FROM LAKEWAY Rentals, you will get sick or hurt and never get your deposit back. CALL ANYONE ELSE!!!!

reviews.author: Forlorn Fantasy
reviews.review: I came in to sign a lease and they had told me my rent was 900 then they switched it and said 1200. Then tried to charge me a deposit of 1200 which is illegal here. After fighting with them constantly I was able tl find a molded rotten

reviews.author: Benjamin Montoya
reviews.review: Rent is expensive. Living standards are terrible. They ignore all work orders until the next tenants come to look at your house. First day we moved in there was a leak from the shower that came into the downstairs living room and it took

reviews.author: Ab McDonald
reviews.review: A literal joke of a rental company, raising rent 30%. Have unfortunately rented through them for 2 years. Literally talk to anyone who has had an experience with Lakeway and they will tell you to run.

reviews.author: Liam Myers
reviews.review: If I could give them 0 stars I would. Quite literally the most atrocious and abusive rental agency in Bellingham. They WILL take advantage of you at every corner and not do a thing about it.

reviews.author: Simon
reviews.review: Lots of friends renting from these guys.  If you have a choice, avoid them at all costs.  Most houses have atleast one major plumbing issue on top of the lack of proper door knobs/locks.  Mold can be a major issue. One of their roommates

reviews.author: Katie Donner
reviews.review: Its been 5 days since the maintenance guy has gone to Cheri for approval to fix our roof leak (why do they need approval to fix a roof leak?). Its been 3 months since the maintenance guy has gone to the store for supplies to fix our

reviews.author: SB
reviews.review: I know there are plenty of low ratings for this company, and so I wanted to write one once I was completely done with my move out and my deposit refund. I have received 90 percent of my deposit back (10% from battery replacement, and bulbs

reviews.author: Hattie Bakke
reviews.review: I would give zero stars if I could. This company is a disgusting excuse of a business that exploits young poor people who cannot afford lawyers. We havent had a working fridge for a month and recently our water shut off (water is included

reviews.author: Baal Wildhart
reviews.review: This place is the absolute worst. Do not trust them. My ceiling was dripping for half a year before they decided to fix it. No reimbursements, then when I moved out and was told I'd be getting my full depositback they deside to change their minds and keep $400. This place is terrible. Choose somewhere else and save yourself the headache.

reviews.author: Sara Hansen
reviews.review: If I could give 0 stars I would. This managing  'Realtor' has been verbally abusive and very unprofessional. They do not do anything electronically.  We closed a mobile home based on "approval" give verbally by the secretary. The 'Realtor'

reviews.author: Tyler Masterson
reviews.review: Cheri, the manager of the company, is an amazing person. She has a caring heart and has always been willing to help us. Dont listen to what others are saying about her. She has a fun sense of humor that you have to understand.

reviews.author: Stephanie Sharp
reviews.review:
These people care nothing for their rentals or their tenants. Again and again I was treated terribly.
When I first moved in, they claimed the unit had been cleaned, but there was

reviews.author: Elly Connett
reviews.review: least professional real estate company Ive used in Bellingham. Cheri specifically has messed up so many times on my paperwork that I am now standing outside the office waiting to sign the lease to the house I was supposed to sign in March

reviews.author: Nick A
reviews.review: Can I give them 0 stars? By far the worst realty company in Whatcom County. Slum lords to say the least. We had a multitude of issues that were never fixed, we asked to get our plumbing looked at because our shower wasnt working at the

reviews.author: Whitney
reviews.review: Cheri (or whatever her name is) frequently yelled at people in the office. She yelled at me once too.  One of the times I was waiting, I heard her talking to someone else who worked there and they were trashing tenants. They also SAID THEY

reviews.author: Maddy
reviews.review: This company is insane... I know theres not a lot of choice in the bellingham housing game but Jesus, they are so unorganized I actually have no idea how they remain in business. The house itself was fine, but just the most unorganized and

reviews.author: Galen LaPlante
reviews.review: If I could give zero stars, I would. This is the worst property management company I have ever dealt with. I stayed in one of their properties from 2016-2017 while going to WWU. They were quite unresponsive with our maintenance requests,

reviews.author: Stephenie Keenan
reviews.review: Theres probably 100 bad things I could say about lakeway reality. I lived in a large home with 5 other roommates and the house was built very cheap. Upon move in, while installing our internet we noticed a VERY bad flea infestation. So bad

reviews.author: Grady Haskell
reviews.review:
Wish I could rate 0 stars
To start they changed the rent on me and made me sign an initial agreement that raised my rent by $500 dollars. I was able to correct this but still, very

reviews.author: Nicholas Parmley
reviews.review: Lakeway Realty is pitiful, they let their properties deteriorate to disrepair then do maintenance on them to just keep them habitable.  My roomates ceiling leaked when it rained for 3 months before any action was taken, to finally get any

reviews.author: Kendall Friend
reviews.review:
Lakeway realty is well known as Bellingham slum lords
Was rented a home not up to code that was leaking water it had a serious mold issue that made me and my roommates very sick. We ended up finding a lawyer,

reviews.author: Zander Philips
reviews.review: I started renting through Lakeway in a September. The day we moved in me and all the roommates got sick and we soon realized there were squirrels in the attic and walls. That was back in September, but we still have squirrels! We have

reviews.author: hank armstrong
reviews.review: absolutely egregious business. completely unprofessional and fraudulent. dont give this company your business or let them take a year of your life away! piss poor properties that are barely livible and completely neglected when it comes to

reviews.author: David Gentry
reviews.review: Lakeway is, by far, the least professional landlord/property management company I've had the misfortune of dealing with. Maintenance requests are routinely ignored, communication from them has grammar and spelling issues that frequently

reviews.author: Connor Jones
reviews.review: This company is terrible. We are living in one of their units right now and it has been very poorly kept. There are exposed nails coming from the hardwood, random patches of carpet, wall repairs that havent been painted over, and many

reviews.author: Emily Sowers
reviews.review: They have no regard for their tenants and only care about you when you're late on rent. They will ignore your maintenance requests and then charge you later for it. No matter how many times we had issues with the home our requests went unanswered and we constantly got pushed aside. Recommend you never rent from these people.

reviews.author: Michelle Hughes
reviews.review: To quote a previous review: This is a horrific, shady, crooked, dirty company! They steal deposits from college students and charge outrageous fees on top of keeping the deposit for things that were documented to need repairs at move-in!

reviews.author: Kate
reviews.review: I know housing can be tough to find for students but signing with Lakeway is not worth it. Any appointment you make, anything you sign, anything you have put in writing, means nothing to the employees there. If your unit isnt being maintained you are in distress and asking for help they will hang up on you.

reviews.author: Kevin Willis
reviews.review: Rented from them a few years ago. Lost most of my damage deposit due to false claims on their end that we had incurred more damage than we actually had (which was little to none). This was my first apartment and I definitely learned the

reviews.author: janine manchel
reviews.review: SENT THIS LETTER 6/14/17 AND SO FAR, IT'S BEEN IGNORED!  RENTERS BEWARE!!!  EDITED FOR CHARACTER SPACES PERMITTED!

reviews.author: Moira Shick
reviews.review: Door had a busted handle and broken frame when we moved in (was later told it had been kicked open before). Now, moving out, the frame is still damaged and they only came and to fix the handle when my husband threatened legal action. Fridge

reviews.author: Isaiah Adams
reviews.review: Tried to charge us $4600 after move out. They make up stories in order to pay for the necessary repairs that exist on their frumpy, unkept houses... And all on your "damage deposit and fee" dollar. We rented from them again because they

reviews.author: D Queasy
reviews.review: I have never been treated so badly in my life. The people who work here are not just rude- they are mean and insulting. Not only that but they rip you off and never clean the units for new people. I moved into a house and the back porch was so unsafe that it was condemned and they didn't tell me anything.

reviews.author: Aeniah Frost
reviews.review: Told us to not worry about the stained carpet and walls, only to be charged 1600 upon moving out, in addition to losing 1200 in deposit. Delinquent in fixing issues, I had mice in my house because they are useless.

reviews.author: Ben Koch
reviews.review: Please don't rent from this company. Among countless examples, I had to call three times to have someone come out to remove black mold from our bathroom. Their response, "You're afraid of mold? You know mold grows on cheese right?".

reviews.author: Lereana Myers
reviews.review: They don't even deserve one star. DO NOT RENT FROM THIS COMPANY. EVER. NO MATTER WHAT. They did nothing to respond to our service requests and complaints/concerns during the lease. Not only that, they charged me and my roommates OBSCENE

reviews.author: Riley Keown
reviews.review: These people are slumlords. They refused to pay for repairs, their homes are moldy and falling apart. Cherie at the front desk is incredibly volatile. I have seen her have meltdowns in the office yelling at customers.

reviews.author: Flux911
reviews.review: Horribly managed. Tried to tell me my furnace was a hot water heater more than twice. Rent raises $100's every year. No communication, can't get a call back from "Dave." (if he even exists)

reviews.author: Andy Huynh
reviews.review: I wish I could give these people 0 stars because I know even 1 star is too much. Their maintenance crew is a joke. Their customers service is a joke. They run their business out of a shanty. If you want them fix anything, you're honestly

reviews.author: Falcon Punch
reviews.review: For the love of god, avoid Lakeway Rentals at all cost. Disgusting and unkempt units and a very lazy office staff. It's a nightmare to try and get stuff fixed, especially if they don't deem it necessary. They worst part is is that the units aren't even that affordable.

reviews.author: Francine St Laurent
reviews.review: Doesn't even need to be said, due to the very evident rating, but worst company I have every interacted with. Avoid like the f***ing plague that they are. Conniving, deceitful and cheap. You will spend immense amounts of energy and time to

reviews.author: timmyb151
reviews.review: Let me start by saying that this rental company is a joke. The people in the office are worthless and about as coherent as a 5 year old. The people who they send out for repairs are almost as bad. Why even fix something if its not going to work? Stupid. These people are losers, liars, and idiots. I don't know how they go about living.

reviews.author: Kyle m
reviews.review: The main office attendant (Cheri), has gotten into public arguments and has abysmal customer service. In addition, I have needed (and repeatedly asked) for a repair only to have it never be addressed to or come to fruition (this has been a nearly 9 month process).

reviews.author: Robert N (BhamRcHampsterCrawlers)
reviews.review:
You get what you get from a realty company it's about what you put in as a tenant that gets you either ahead in Life or behind in life
Been renting from Lakeway properties for over 7 years now and always treated me

reviews.author: bridget norton
reviews.review: Don't even bother trying to deal with these people. Complete liars over things that don't need to be lied about because they don't want to do their jobs correctly or rent out their properties. Read the rest of the reviews and you'll get what I mean.

reviews.author: Noelle Stone
reviews.review: Always been quick to respond to any maintenance problems we have had. Just email an official request and call to make sure they received it. Have been with them over a year and have always experienced good customer service.

reviews.author: Signs Plus Install
reviews.review: Terrible. I feel the term Slum Lord is quite befitting. They do not attend to or complete repairs in a timely manner. Their greed is outstanding.

reviews.author: Silja Stanley
reviews.review: This is a horrific, shady, crooked, dirty company! They steal deposits from college students and charge outrageous fees on top of keeping the deposit for things that were documented to need repairs at move-in! Thieves!

reviews.author: GodNuggetz
reviews.review: Total slumlords if you look at any other reviews it's a ton of horror stories and my experience was no different when myself and my roommates moved in it hadn't been cleaned from the previous tenants and was disgusting, my roommates and I

reviews.author: Alex Slagle
reviews.review: Terrible. The staff have been unhelpful in fixing leaking floors, and 15 calls later I still wear shoes in the bathroom so my feet dont get wet. I will be pressing legal action. DONT TRUST THIS COMPANY!!!!

reviews.author: jasmine henderson
reviews.review: DO NOT GO THROUGH THEM. They dont care about tennants and weve had nonstop problems with them, they are rude and do not fix problems im very upset with their lack of care.

reviews.author: talkswith ray
reviews.review: Scummy, sleazy and deceptive. ONLY RENT FROM LAKEWAY IF YOU HAVE NO OTHER OPTIONS. They will scam you and or squeeze you for all the money they can.

reviews.author: Zach Dane
reviews.review: Pretty simple - DON'T GO WITH GLO - the head realtor at Fairhaven is a Dinosaur and doesn't know her stuff. I wouldn't take any advice from her or that business. Stear clear.

reviews.author: carl smith
reviews.review: Terribly sleazy business, they don't care about you, and they don't care about the houses they rent.  I think their business model is to prey on incoming college students who haven't heard how awful they are yet.

reviews.author: cody sophusson
reviews.review: They kinda suck... people next to use smoke pot like no tomorrow and we get blamed for it. We are 24 and pick on us....

reviews.author: James Root
reviews.review: Good service, but to get in you need first and last months rent, as well as a security deposit which is also another rent, all at once

reviews.author: Tom Montanaro
reviews.review: These people are a bunch of thugs ripping off anyone and everyone who will walk through their front door. Run away as fast as you can!

reviews.author: Becks Kobel
reviews.review: This company is 100% unprofessional, rude, cannot seem to understand that they are a business. No one should ever rent from them.

reviews.author: Jacob Miller
reviews.review: Never rent from Lakeway. They're bad business.

reviews.author: Nate Sawyer
reviews.review: Disorganized, antagonistic management and barely-maintained properties make this company a poor choice for any well-informed  renter-to-be

reviews.author: Stacy Smith
reviews.review: We have experienced graciousness and generosity from Lakeway Realty,  true compassionate care.

reviews.author: R A
reviews.review: These folks, particularly the office ladies, have always been really great to me

reviews.author: Xavier P.
reviews.review: Communicating via email with them has been painful enough so I won't even bother contacting them further.

reviews.author: Kai Simmons
reviews.review: Really nice people working there, just took their time on fixing worn down things around the house.

reviews.author: Troy Greig
reviews.review: Avoid at all costs. One of the agents left a woman in tears while I waited for an appointment.

reviews.author: Caitie
reviews.review: Rented from lakeway for 2 years and they are basically slumlords. Terrible terrible terrible.

reviews.author: Dave Wright
reviews.review: Super rude counter lady.  Would hate to try and bargain with that one.

reviews.author: Eileen Byrne
reviews.review: Crooks! Stay far away from these horrible people.

reviews.author: Jamie Winters
reviews.review: Do no move into Sunset Studios.

reviews.author: Michael Baughn
reviews.review: Most unprofessional real estate in business....

reviews.author: MM TRC
reviews.review: Only go to Lakeway Realty to pay Rent.

reviews.review: Worst place in Bellingham to rent from!

reviews.review: Terrible. Slum lords of Bellingham.

reviews.review: Alright
